### [**Disciplines**]{.smallcaps}

Biostatistics; Epidemiology; Biomedical Data Science; Aging

### [**Research Interest**]{.smallcaps}

-   ***Aging-related Diseases:*** Cognitive decline; Dementia; Cardiovascular disease

-   ***Research Methods:*** Machine Learning; Functional analysis; Omics procedure; Causal inference;

-   ***High Dimensional Data:*** Accelerator data; Metabonomics; Genomics

-   ***Composite Indicator:*** Biological age; Digital biomarker; Dietary pattern
